source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_SEQ_00<tab>Odo needs someone to pass on a message.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_SEQ_00<tab>アラギリのオドは、冒険者に大切な仕事を頼みたいようだ。
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TODO_00<tab>黒渦団の将校に「称賛する」をする
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TODO_01<tab>隊商宿グッドブレード跡の双蛇党の将校に「称賛する」をする
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TODO_02<tab>アラギリの双蛇党の兵卒に「称賛する」をする

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_000<tab>Wait, I know you. <var 29 EB02 /var>! Well, this is certainly a welcome surprise. If you don't mind my imposing, I'd like to ask a favor of you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_000あなた、冒険者でもある、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんですよね。
解放軍と同盟軍を結んでくださった、あなたにこそ、
お願いしたいことがあるのです……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_001<tab>As you're well aware, the battle at Rhalgr's Reach was gruesome, with heavy losses on both sides. If what I've been told is true, our losses would have been far greater, if not for one brave soul.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_001ラールガーズリーチが帝国軍部隊の強襲を受けたときのこと。
その猛攻により、多くの命が奪われていく中で、
希望を捨てず、戦い続けた兵がいました。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_002<tab>He was only a messenger for the Alliance meant to relay information to our commanders, yet he went above and beyond the call of duty seeing the wounded to safety, all the while fending off enemy attacks.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_002彼は、伝令役として滞在していた同盟軍の兵士でした。
敵の攻撃をかいくぐりながら、味方を安全な場所に誘導し、
司令部に正確な情報を送り続け、多くの命を救ったのです。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_003<tab>Such heroism is worthy of great praise, and I would thank him myself if I weren't preoccupied with my duties.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_003その献身的な行動は、称賛に値するでしょう。
噂で、彼がアラギリに来ていると聞いたのですが、
私は任務のために、ここを離れられません。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_004<tab>They say he's come to Ala Ghiri, and so I would ask you to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>congratulate<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him in my stead, as well as the officer who trained such a truehearted soldier.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_004「同盟軍の将校」に彼の居場所を聞いて、
我らの気持ちを、伝えていただけませんか？
そして、上官である方にも、ぜひとも「称賛」を。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_005<tab>You'll go and congratulate him for me, won't you? I can only hope he hasn't already left Ala Ghiri.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_005<tab>我々の感謝の気持ちが、彼に伝わればよいのですが。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_MAELSTROMGENERAL_000_010<tab>Unless there's something I can help you with, I must ask that you move along.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_MAELSTROMGENERAL_000_010<tab>冒険者殿が、なにかご用でしょうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_MAELSTROMGENERAL_000_011<tab>What's this? I don't recall doing anything worthy of praise...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_MAELSTROMGENERAL_000_011突然、どうされたのですか？
私は冒険者殿に、称賛されるようなことは……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_MAELSTROMGENERAL_000_012<tab>With all due respect, you are mistaken. It was a unit of the Twin Adder that was charged with relaying communications to Alliance commanders. I believe a few of their officers are still stationed at Goodblade if you wish to speak with them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_MAELSTROMGENERAL_000_012あのとき、伝令を務めていたのは、
我が部隊ではなく、「双蛇党」だったはずです。
「称賛」は、隊商宿グッドブレード跡に駐留している彼らへ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_MAELSTROMGENERAL_000_013<tab>If this soldier did all you claim he truly is deserving of praise. If you wish to speak with him, a few Twin Adder officers should still be stationed at Goodblade.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_MAELSTROMGENERAL_000_013あのとき、伝令を務めていたのは、
我が部隊ではなく、「双蛇党」だったはずです。
「称賛」は、隊商宿グッドブレード跡に駐留している彼らへ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERGENERAL_000_020<tab>Greetings, adventurer. Is there something I can help you with? If so, please speak up.
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERGENERAL_000_021<tab>Hm? Is there some cause for celebration I'm not aware of?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERGENERAL_000_021<tab>ふむ……貴方に称賛される理由は、とくに思い至らないが。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERGENERAL_000_022<tab>I see... Yes, I do recall a man from my unit being assigned that position. Unfortunately I was stationed at Castrum Oriens at the time, so I cannot say for certain who it was.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERGENERAL_000_022なるほど……。
確かに、我が部隊から伝令を派遣したが、
私は……カストルム・オリエンスに滞在していただけだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERGENERAL_000_023<tab>My subordinates would know who it is you seek. However, they are to return home after one final patrol around Ala Ghiri. If you go now, perhaps you can speak with one of them before they leave.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERGENERAL_000_023「称賛」されるべきは、現地で任務を果たした部下たちだろう。
その内のひとりが、アラギリで最後の任務についている。
よかったら、今の話を聞かせてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERGENERAL_000_024<tab>My subordinates will be leaving for home after a last patrol of Ala Ghiri. If you wish to speak with them, you should go now.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERGENERAL_000_024伝令任務を果たした部下のひとりが、
アラギリで最後の任務についている。
「称賛」されるべきなのは、彼らだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERSOLDIER_000_030<tab>Please leave... I need to be alone.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERSOLDIER_000_030<tab>すまないが、ひとりにしてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERSOLDIER_000_031<tab>I said leave, damn you! Why do you insist on showering me with unwarranted gratitude?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERSOLDIER_000_031……やめろ！
俺は、称賛されるようなことは何もしていない！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERSOLDIER_000_032<tab>Yes, I was there at Rhalgr's Reach, but I was barely able to escape with my life, let alone save another's.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERSOLDIER_000_032確かに、俺たちの部隊はラールガーズリーチにいたよ。
だが、生き残るのに必死で、俺は誰ひとりとして救えなかった。
……あいつのことも。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERSOLDIER_000_033<tab>I'm afraid the man you're looking for isn't here. Such a brave soul, that one. Our mission was done yet he chose to stay on the front lines and save as many as he could. If not for his injuries, he...he would have...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERSOLDIER_000_033真の英雄は、ここで眠ってるよ。
最後まで前線に残って、あいつは大勢を救った。
だが、数日前……あのときの傷がもとで、息を引き取ったんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERSOLDIER_000_034<tab>The man died a hero, though I doubt anyone will ever know it. All we can do now is <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>pray<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> he finds peace in the great beyond.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_TWINADDERSOLDIER_000_034奴を弔ったことで、俺の最後の任務は終わった。
もしよかったら、あいつのために「祈って」くれ。
残された俺たちにできるのは、それくらいしかないからな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_SYSTEM_000_035<tab>You have arrived too late to offer your praise. However, it is not too late to offer your respects with a solemn prayer.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_SYSTEM_000_035亡くなった同盟軍の伝令が、
手厚く葬られているようだ……。
兵士の功績を讃えるために、墓に向かって「祈る」をしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_SYSTEM_000_036<tab>The wind gently whispers as if in response to your prayer.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_SYSTEM_000_036「祈り」に応えるように、風が吹いたようだ。
「オド」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_040<tab>How fares the unsung hero of Rhalgr's Reach?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_040<tab>我々の感謝の気持ちを、伝えてきてもらえましたか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_041<tab>Oh... Oh, I see. Sorry to hear that. I'll have to go pay my respects later.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_041そんな……あのときの傷のせいで亡くなっていたとは……。
私も後で、彼に救われた人たちと共に、祈りを捧げてきます。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_042<tab>It's a terrible tragedy to lose such a fine soldier, but through his sacrifice a great many will live to keep fighting the good fight.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_042ですが、我々にできることは、ほかにもあるはず。
救われたこの命を使い、真の平和を取り戻すこと……。
それが……生き残った者の責務だと思います。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_043<tab>We will carry on in his stead, and someday bring a lasting peace to the realm.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ803_02831_ODO_000_043<tab>ありがとうございました、冒険者さん。
